snippet: The company said its April-June quarter profit of $482 million was up 15.3 percent from a year earlier.
abstract: Infosys reports quarterly profit of $482 million, up 15.3 percent from same period one year earlier.
lead_paragraph: The company said its April-June quarter profit of $482 million was up 15.3 percent from a year earlier.

headline.main: Infosys, Under New Leader, Shows Big Profit Gain
headline.print_headline: Infosys, Under New Leader, Shows Big Profit Gain
